channel.title: Freezing spells?
channel.description: How do I make it so that spells will freeze players (Unable to move)? Like ice blitz, barrage, entangle... etc....

item.title: Freezing spells?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

X F U R Y X:

Dude, one thing tho, how do you get rid of the wilderness warning? Like when you are near the wild it gives you that? And since my server starts in the wild, it comes up whenever you login, and then it closes out “my” welcome screen (The classic gay on paper welcome screen)

Search, setInterfaceWalkable(1908);

Or something close, if you can’t find the above, search…
Walkable(1908);

Delete them all.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

o,o lol just add a menu to come up when a player logs in and put this

put your menu void here for welcome screen()
{
String owner = "pure 4 u 2 c";
String LU = "None";
String max = "99";
String site = "none yet";
sendQuest("  Welcome To pures scape ", 15950);
sendQuest("", 15959);
sendQuest("", 15960);
sendQuest("", 15961);
sendQuest("Server created by: @whi@"+owner, 15951);
sendQuest("Site: @whi@"+site, 15952);
sendQuest("         Latest Update: @whi@"+LU, 15953);

item.title: Freezing spells?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

X F U R Y X:

not really, i was wondering how you did it, not what you did exact… thats not leeching…

Laal…

Add this…

public void newWelc()
{
String owner = "Owner Name";
String LU = "Latest Update";
String ver = "Version";
String site = "Site?";
sendQuest("  Yur message?", 15950);
sendQuest("Yur Message?", 15959);
sendQuest("", 15960);
sendQuest("", 15961);
sendQuest("Server Created by: "+owner", 15951);
sendQuest("FORUMM", 15952);
sendQuest("Latest Update: "+LU, 15953);
sendQuest("Yur Message?", 15954);
sendQuest("", 15955);
sendQuest("", 15956);
sendQuest("", 15957);
sendQuest("", 15958);

showInterface(15944);
}

In yur welcome message add, newWelc(); . .

squal707:

well lol your asking to leech stuff from mine -,- if i was asking to leech stuff from you wouldnt you do the same =p

Lol, why would people wanna leech your welcome screen when it’s on TONS of servers. And i bet you didn’t even make it, got it from the downloaded source, changed the name and text. Woop, phree welcome…

item.title: Freezing spells?
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

add this in your walking case

if (EntangleDelay >= 1) {
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
sendMessage("A magical force stops you from moving!");

and depending on if you have them or not, put this in void process

        if(EntangleDelay > 0)
        EntangleDelay -= 1;

this with the rest of your ints

        public int EntangleDelay = 0;

and this with your voids

public void entangle()
{
EntangleDelay = 20;
}
public void uberentangle()
{
EntangleDelay = 40;
}

if your magic doesnt already have entangling in it, then too bad im not gonna give you a copy of my magic

Read full topic
